pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, November 12, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

6:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually participate in the 2021 Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) Leaders’ Summit.

Closed to media

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Prince Edward Island, Dennis King. Minister of Veterans Affairs and Associate Minister of National Defence Lawrence MacAulay will be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
